import { Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs/blocks';

<Meta title="Templates/Actions/Copy Case" />

# Copy Case Action

```jsx
const CopyCaseAction = (props) => withActionView({
	...props,
	title: "Copy Case",
	ViewForm: ResourceCreateWizard,
	pages: R.map(R.when(R.is(Function), R.call), [CopyCasePropertiesPage, CopyCasePreviewPage, CopyCaseAttachmentsPage]),
	submitLabel: 'Copy',
	// model link for Copy Case is link to Create Case;
	actionLinkFn: (action) => action && getLinkByRel(action._links, 'model') // action link for Copy Case is a model link from Create Case;
}, () => null);
```
